mapper.select: SELECT dynamic_record.dr_id dr_id, dynamic_record.user_id user_id, dynamic_record.title, dynamic_record.content, dynamic_record.create_time, file_record.file_url file_url, file_record.fr_id fr_id, file_record.e_tag e_tag FROM t_dynamic_record dynamic_record, t_dynamic_record_attachment_relation dynamic_record_attachment_relation, t_file_record file_record WHERE dynamic_record.dr_id = dynamic_record_attachment_relation.dr_id AND dynamic_record_attachment_relation.fr_id = file_record.fr_id AND dynamic_record.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY dynamic_record.create_time DESC
SELECT dr.dr_id, dr.user_id, dr.title, dr.content, dr.create_time FROM `t_dynamic_record` dr ORDER BY `create_time` DESC

SELECT dynamic_record.dr_id dr_id, dynamic_record.user_id user_id, dynamic_record.title, dynamic_record.content, dynamic_record.create_time, file_record.file_url file_url, file_record.fr_id fr_id, file_record.e_tag e_tag FROM t_dynamic_record dynamic_record, t_dynamic_record_attachment_relation dynamic_record_attachment_relation, t_file_record file_record WHERE dynamic_record.dr_id = dynamic_record_attachment_relation.dr_id AND dynamic_record_attachment_relation.fr_id = file_record.fr_id ORDER BY dynamic_record.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `t_dynamic_record`(dr_id, user_id, title, content) VALUES (#{drId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content})
